content: **details** * pattern consists of 32 rounds * level is advanced * stitches/terms slip_stitch skip chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet csdc tc bp/fp fl/bl blo popcorn cluster half_double_crochet-cluster decrease dc3tog small picot large picot * your gauge will determine things like hook size yardage finished size and height of stitches any of these things can be adjusted as needed ---------------------------------------------- **languages** this pattern is available in english and russian if you are able and desire to translate the pattern into your native language please use this form to contact me 1 only authorized translations are permitted * *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri and наталья коваленко * * *spanish/espanol language translation by virginia padilla and tested by rafa silva and tere gomis * * *de nederlandse vertaling werd verzorgd door anneke de wilde* ------------------------------------------ **community** join our discussion and support group for designs by grace fearon on facebook 2 join our discord channel 3 *thank you so very much to my testers on this pattern cille heckenbach siva oduri margaret schwerin juanita carol vikki lehigh-hooks 1 http //www gracefearon com/pattern-translator-application 2 https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 3 https //discord gg/atndgvj
